name: Yard
longDesc:
You are in the yard.
If you turn east and face the house, a basement hatch is on the south-eastern corner, and a door to the dining room is on the north-eastern corner.
There is a patio umbrella folded on the ground next to this exit.
To the west, there is a sandbox.
There is an eagle circling overhead.
You need to collect sand from the sandbox.
You can use the umbrella to hide from the eagle.
description:
You are in the yard.
If you turn east and face the house, a basement hatch is on the south-eastern corner, and a door to the dining room is on the north-eastern corner.
There is a patio umbrella folded on the ground next to this exit.
To the west, there is a sandbox.
There is an eagle circling overhead.

eagle.name: eagle
eagle.description: There is an eagle overhead. Don't look at it unless you want it to notice you.

sandbox.name: sandbox
sandbox.description: There is a sandbox full of sand, toys, and buckets.

sand.name: sand
sand.description: The sand is from the sandbox. You need it for the quest
